summary: This test suite contains unit tests for the various evaluation modules of a geospatial AI library, covering chip classification, general classification, object detection, and semantic segmentation. The tests verify correct metric computation, proper handling of missing or null ground‑truth and prediction data, configuration validation, AOI processing, and merging of evaluation items.
business_intent: Guarantee the accuracy and robustness of model evaluation pipelines used in geospatial analytics by automatically detecting configuration errors and edge‑case failures, thereby ensuring reliable performance reporting for downstream decision‑making.
